description: This file defines a React context and associated provider components for handling notifications within a React application. It includes functions to push and remove notifications, managing notification state via hooks.

methods.name: NotificationProvider({ children })
methods.description: A React component that provides notification management functionality through context, maintaining notifications state internally.

methods.name: pushNotification
methods.description: Function to add a new notification to the notifications list with a message and optional type.

methods.name: removeNotification
methods.description: Function to remove a notification from the list by its ID.

methods.name: useNotification()
methods.description: Custom hook that provides access to the notification context for components.
